content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LSEG Account in EPAM\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The history of the account started many years ago. In 2002 company Multex, a provider of global financial information, started its cooperation with EPAM. In 2003 Multex was acquired by Reuters, the global information company, which continued its partnership with EPAM. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Thomson Corporation acquired Reuters Group PLC to form Thomson Reuters on April 17, 2008, and EPAM has been the proven vendor to this company since the beginning till nowadays. On October 1st, 2018, Thomson Reuters sold the Financial & Risk unit, which has been renamed into Refinitiv, a name derived from the 160-year-old Reuters brand to enable “definitive action in financial markets”. In January 2021 LSEG completes the all-share acquisition of Refinitiv. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After all these years of supplying not only teams to do engineering, but also providing help in dealing with any other issues, that can appear, EPAM becomes a strategic supplier for the client. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Today LSEG Account is the biggest accounts in EPAM by the headcount, which unites almost 2500+ people across 20 locations. We continue to equip our client and all the financial community with advanced technology, data, and expertise.
